questions.question: Is this credit applicable?
questions.subsectionIntent: Intent: Improve the net quality of life of all communities affected by the organisation and/or project and mitigate negative impacts to communities.
questions.subsectionMetric: Metric: Measures taken to assess community needs and improve quality of life while minimizing negative impacts.
questions.subsectionDescription: Applicability: It is likely that all organisations and/or projects have the ability to align organisational and/or project objectives with community needs and goals, identified through active engagement, in order to achieve broad community satisfaction. It would therefore be difficult to demonstrate that the credit is not relevant or applicable to an organisation and/or a project seeking an recognition.

questions.question: Your company recruits Ecology Awareness talent primarily through recruiting agencies.
questions.subsectionIntent: Intent: Actively engage with local communities to ensure their participation and involvement in decision-making processes related to the organization or project.
questions.subsectionMetric: Metric: Measures taken to assess community participation and engagement in decision-making processes.
questions.subsectionDescription: Applicability: Community engagement is essential for the success of any project or organization, as it fosters trust, transparency, and inclusivity.

questions.question: New Ecology Awareness talents have an onboarding process to become effective quickly.
questions.subsectionIntent: Intent: Obtain commitment and support from organizational leaders to prioritize and champion Ecology Awareness initiatives.
questions.subsectionMetric: Metric: Measures taken to demonstrate leadership support and commitment to Ecology Awareness initiatives.
questions.subsectionDescription: Applicability: Strong leadership support is crucial for the success and sustainability of Ecology Awareness initiatives within an organization.

questions.question: Your company continuously produces data from its customer-facing services.
questions.subsectionIntent: Intent: Implement effective data management and governance practices to ensure the quality, security, and accessibility of data.
questions.subsectionMetric: Metric: Measures taken to assess data quality, security, and accessibility.
questions.subsectionDescription: Applicability: Proper data management and governance are essential for leveraging data effectively to support decision-making and improve organizational performance.

questions.question: Your company uses tools to specify and manage data-lifecycles.
questions.subsectionIntent: Intent: Establish policies and procedures for governing data throughout its lifecycle, from creation to disposal, to ensure compliance, integrity, and usability.
questions.subsectionMetric: Metric: Measures taken to evaluate the effectiveness of data governance and lifecycle management processes.
questions.subsectionDescription: Applicability: Effective data governance and lifecycle management support regulatory compliance, mitigate risks, and enhance the value and utility of data assets.
